data.text: @joglasg I'm having a duvet day because germs. I'm tempted to watch it again, but I think it might just break my face.

@lizzie_yeates It really is. The cinematography is gorgeous. 

I too loved the soundtrack. 

I found the switching back + forth of timelines a bit disorientating but it's just a film that requires focus. 

Really stunning piece of art imho
@joglasg Oh, it is stunning. The sound track is also brilliant. I did sob though. That's a two boxes of tissues film.
@cliodhnacarthy Yes, I think he seemed quite troubled but he also no doubt loved nature and adventure.
@joglasg Saw this film years ago. I howled for days afterwards and to this day I cannot bear thinking about it, let alone watch it again.
@1977220174U That's him yep. Died of starvation either from a toxic from berries or just not being able to find enough food
